feed.title: Leantime Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Other Changes

  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2422
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/browser from 7.102.1 to 7.103.0 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2423
  • [Snyk] Upgrade datatables.net from 1.13.10 to 1.13.11 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2424
  • [Snyk] Upgrade uppy from 3.22.2 to 3.23.0 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2425
  • Update zh-CN.ini by @rqi14 in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2429
  • Fix content-disposition header by @gramakri in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2431
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2433
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2435
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/browser from 7.103.0 to 7.104.0 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2436
  • [Snyk] Upgrade gridstack from 10.1.0 to 10.1.1 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2437
  • Misc ux fixes by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2434
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @lottiefiles/lottie-player from 2.0.3 to 2.0.4 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2440
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2438
  • Phpstan lvl0 by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2450
  • Castupdates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2451
  • Update Notifications.php by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2452
  • change check by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2453

New Contributors

  • @rqi14 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2429
  • @gramakri made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2431

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.1.0-beta...v3.1.1

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.1.2
entry.content:
Other Changes

  • fix incorrect symbol in the translation for zh-CN by @rqi14 in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2461
  • Fixes projectCalendar and comment dates. by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2463
  • Middle wareimprovements by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2475
  • [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.1.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2480
  • [Snyk] Upgrade gridstack from 10.1.1 to 10.1.2 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2476
  • [Snyk] Upgrade uppy from 3.23.0 to 3.24.0 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2471
  • [Snyk] Upgrade htmx.org from 1.9.10 to 1.9.11 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2469
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/webpack-plugin from 2.14.2 to 2.16.0 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2468
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/browser from 7.104.0 to 7.108.0 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2467
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/browser from 7.108.0 to 7.109.0 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2481
  • Milestone project selector fix by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2483
  • Add project return by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2484
  • Hide company menu point by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2485

New Contributors

  • @github-actions made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2480

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.1.1...v3.1.2

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.1.3
entry.content:
Other Changes

  • [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.1.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2486
  • Default theme fixes by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2491
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @fortawesome/fontawesome-free from 6.5.1 to 6.5.2 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2489
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/webpack-plugin from 2.16.0 to 2.16.1 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2490
  • [fix] Delete user should remove project relationships by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2493
  • Improve onboarding flow by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2492

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.1.2...v3.1.3

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.1.4
entry.content:
What has changed

  • b5ba975: [housekeeping] version bump
  • c3bdd04: [fix] news notification doesn't disappear bug
  • ef6a6c6: [fix] news notification doesn't disappear bug
  • fc6cf2f: [enhancement] Align initial filters to be the current week
  • ab40097: [fix] disabling adding time registrations in previous timezones
  • 9f9adf0: [housekeeping] clean up whitespaces and comments
  • 2e9db31: [fix] timesheet entries that fall on midnight were not included

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.1.4...v3.1.4

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.2.0
entry.content:
Changes in this Release

Before upgrading

  • Before you upgrade please disable all installed plugins. Once the upgrade is complete each plugin must be re-installed to get the latest version.
  • When updating manually (copy pasting code) please ensure to remove old unneded classes in the core folder. It is best to do a full replace.

Breaking Changes

  • The jsonRPC api was changed in various places. Please ensure to test any api integrations
  • All plugins will need to be updated after an upgrade

Highlights

  • Session management is now handled via laravel. Solving a lot of our timeout and logout issues
  • Improved logging and exception handling
  • jsonRPCApi received a lot of new endpoints
  • Support for Zapier was created. The Zapier integration is in alpha. You can access the private app here: https://zapier.com/developer/public-invite/207240/cac6ec7a911bd5fa7924f38230d58d2f/
  • Fixed various issues on CSV importer
  • A lot of clean up of our core code

Commits

  • 223cf2e4 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.2.0
  • 2ad43d2e Fixes to version management for plugins
  • 53e546fb [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.2.0
  • 7c272f9a Update release.yml
  • 3be56986 file list
  • 16ad7129 Timesheet fixes
  • 7c4e93c3 Update Connector.php
  • 5aeafc0d Update ApiClientTest.php
  • b365dbee fixing csv
  • 103c79ec Rename eventhelpers trait
  • 0c418967 fixing menu related bugs
  • d8afdd9a Support for head requests
  • a83f6457 Update ApiClient.php
  • cdf332de more cleanup
  • 91dde9ee Cleaning core file structure
  • 15e26f84 version bump
  • 26531b00 resolving conflicts
  • f6015804 Update composer.lock
  • 679364ac Fixing phpstan issues
  • 73ad52c8 Misc template enhancements
  • d58e1648 Improves update check in case dbs have to be downgraded.
  • 0538d680 Fixing various dateTime bugs across the system
  • c64f09c8 Adding a new default job worker that can execute queue jobs via classes added to subject
  • 7cb01998 Allow API to use any service and new api endpoints
  • 9ac27326 Adding Redis Support for cache and sessions
  • 30b4fff5 fix the canvas dialogue
  • 9fd512b6 Fix for broken project favorite function
  • 2bce7b65 Update queue service to include web worker
  • b60b8be8 update event cache to include check for debug
  • 03235197 Update bootstrap.php
  • 19fd0d36 Update Logging.php
  • d3d90080 test improvements
  • aa361993 Update dockerfile
  • a028f1ea Fix docker permissions for log files
  • d3621088 Fix make file
  • 6358e857 Clean up old excception handling in httpkernel
  • 199ce6d3 piping environment config through
  • 1fa1f467 Removed exception service provider since handler is managed in environment
  • 5e5c0a6a Added Laravel exception handler with whoops
  • c12ea2cd Update PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md
  • 9397ee73 Fix localization issues for dates with translated day, month names
  • 83a06bfb Fix for storing language
  • b4bfcd3a Move changelogConfig out of the workflow folder
  • 6cd06493 version bump
  • 559ab756 version bump
  • 6764016e Fix for #2606 and saving new items on blueprints
  • 89bcdd6e Install welcome message update
  • 4d0f4506 variable name update and feedback review

  • 2c9e8f80 done
  • a2fd8f8c feedback
  • 256a23aa remove unnecessary plugins
  • 213f5a99 fix make build-dev compile issue and add ddev config
  • 961b8296 1882: move moreinfo into span
  • a4e0b11f resolving the feedback
  • 94224686 blade conversion
  • 7a37ee20 Update README.md for newer mysql version
  • a78ed984 Lossless image filesize reduction
  • 5c82d328 1882: add translations
  • 8eaee143 1882: improve danish translation
  • 966beb5f 1882: add status, start and end date to milestone headline
  • 3cf5c54c Improve current project setting flow
  • c84d0ff4 Making laravel commands available
  • b3002192 Fix ambiguous modified field
  • 375d700c phpstan update
  • 6cd8c8de Fix csvimport
  • 4be81039 Update release.yml
  • ea70e34c Manifest updates
  • 6e5ea13a clean up minimal theme
  • 4f79ea9a fix history push error for modals
  • a10bf2b7 Remove project detail step from onboarding
  • 85a96484 Add modified fileds to db tables
  • 0fff45e9 ensure default value is used in theme settings
  • 6c2e9aa9 Ensure cache is set and used file for images
  • 0fa5db29 update confetti management
  • 78d62232 chore: remove unneeded comment
  • 1e1a5532 chore: switch to more specific function naming pollForNewTimesheets
  • d4a7356c fix: utilize addTicket for new milestone
  • 85fd91f4 chore: clean up function name to encapsulate for todo and not generic ticket
  • 1c9dbc9c enhance: utilize updateTicket instead of making a new zapier function for update todo action
  • 7b6950e7 fix: utilize logTime instead of making new zapier function for action
  • 9489f4af chore: remove unneeded comment
  • 0303b90e enhance: make function name for polling new idea clearer
  • 77acbfdc chore: remove unneccesary todo comment
  • 5623801e chore: default to previous headline of ticket if headline not sent to update function
  • 2c6ba5ed fix: remove headline requirement for updating ticket
  • e2dac9a8 fix: utilize user session with api key call
  • cd9638f0 Updated polish translations
  • 4278b964 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.2.0-beta-2
  • bdc885f2 feat: zapier able to create timesheets via actions
  • 8b2c7ec2 feat: ability for zapier to poll by new timesheets and updated timesheets
  • 676461fc feat: zapier actions to 1 - create todo 2 - create milestone 3 - update todo
  • 63dca561 feat: ability for zapier to poll by new todo's and updated todo's
  • 940175a7 feat: ability for zapier to poll by new milestones and updated milestones
  • 4329be5e fix: ensure date attribute in tickets table gets updated when updating ticket
  • 5cddaca8 feat: ability for zapier to poll by updated projects
  • bdaf7838 feat: ability for zapier to poll by new ideas and updated ideas
  • 75218328 feat: ability for zapier to poll by goals and check for updated goals
  • 167c8a82 feat: ability for zapier to poll by comments

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (58 commits)
  • kylemcshea (22 commits)

  • Sine Jespersen (4 commits)
  • Joseph Roberts (2 commits)
  • phulstaert (1 commits)

  • Mateusz Tylec (1 commits)
